name: Purrtonium Dig
description:
It is the year of the Cat. Space cats from the tribe Meow-Meow have descended on earth to search for Purrtonium, the invaluable mineral their ancestors hid on our planet ages ago.

Greedy and sadistic in nature as they are, the Space Cats have turned this digging quest into sport, pitting two of their own in a race to gather the most Purrtonium.
